questions.q: Tell me about Clinica San Miguel
questions.a: Clinica San Miguel is located in Texas with 19 convenient locations across Dallas, Fort Worth, Houston, Pasadena, Fresno, Farmers Branch, Arlington, and San Antonio. We are committed to serving diverse communities across the state of Texas with bilingual English and Spanish-speaking providers.

Our journey began in 2015 with the establishment of Alianza Medica Hispana, our very first location. Over the years, we've grown and transformed into Clinica San Miguel, expanding our reach and enhancing our services. We now proudly serve patients aged five and older throughout Texas.

questions.q: How many locations do you have?
questions.a: We have 19 convenient locations across Texas, including Dallas, Fort Worth, Houston, Pasadena, Fresno, Farmers Branch, Arlington, and San Antonio.
We started in 2015 as Alianza Medica Hispana and have since grown into Clinica San Miguel, serving communities across Texas.

We offer comprehensive family healthcare with bilingual English and Spanish-speaking providers, state-of-the-art facilities, on-site procedures, and affordable care starting at $19 with no insurance required.
We serve patients aged five and older throughout Texas, with a special commitment to diverse communities. Our bilingual team ensures everyone receives quality healthcare.
Alianza Medica Hispana was our very first location established in 2015. We've since grown and transformed into Clinica San Miguel, expanding our services across Texas.

Clínica San Miguel está ubicada en Texas con 19 ubicaciones convenientes en Dallas, Fort Worth, Houston, Pasadena, Fresno, Farmers Branch, Arlington y San Antonio. Estamos comprometidos a servir a diversas comunidades en todo el estado de Texas con proveedores bilingües que hablan inglés y español.

questions.q: How much does a visit cost?
questions.a: Our visits start at just $19. This affordable price includes a general health check-up where our caring team checks your vitals, answers your questions, and helps you feel your best.

questions.q: What is the cost of services?
questions.a: We offer quality care starting at $19 per visit. No insurance is required, making healthcare accessible to everyone.
No insurance is needed! Our services start at just $19, making quality healthcare affordable for everyone.
Yes! We proudly offer quality care starting at just $19. No hidden fees, no insurance required. We believe healthcare should be accessible to all.
The $19 visit includes a general health check-up with vital signs monitoring, health assessment, and consultation with our medical team.
No hidden fees! Our transparent pricing starts at $19 for quality healthcare visits.
Yes! We designed our services to be affordable for everyone, starting at just $19 with no insurance required.

questions.q: How much is a DOT test?
questions.a: Our DOT exam costs $80. We offer this service 7 days a week with no appointment necessary.

questions.q: How much is a school physical?
questions.a: School physicals cost $60. Ask about any promotional prices in effect at the time of your visit.

questions.q: How much is a PSA test?
questions.a: The prostate blood test (PSA) costs $70. No appointment necessary.
Nuestras visitas comienzan en solo $19. Este precio asequible incluye un chequeo general de salud donde nuestro equipo verifica sus signos vitales, responde sus preguntas y le ayuda a sentirse mejor.
¡No se necesita seguro! Nuestros servicios comienzan en solo $19, haciendo que la atención médica de calidad sea asequible para todos.
We have 19 convenient locations across Texas, including Dallas, Fort Worth, Houston, Pasadena, Fresno, Farmers Branch, Arlington, and San Antonio.

questions.q: How many locations do you have?
questions.a: We have 19 convenient locations throughout Texas to serve you better.

questions.q: Do you have a clinic near me?
questions.a: With 19 locations across Texas in cities like Dallas, Houston, San Antonio, Fort Worth, Pasadena, Fresno, Farmers Branch, and Arlington, we likely have a clinic near you. Check our website for the complete list.
We serve communities across Texas with clinics in Dallas, Fort Worth, Houston, Pasadena, Fresno, Farmers Branch, Arlington, and San Antonio.
We have 19 clinics across Texas. Please visit our website or tell us your city, and we'll help you find the nearest location.

questions.q: How do I find your clinic?
questions.a: Visit our website to use our clinic locator map. We have 19 convenient locations across Texas.
Yes! We have locations in Dallas and throughout Texas. Visit our website to find the Dallas clinic nearest to you.
Yes! We serve Houston with multiple locations. Check our website for the Houston clinic nearest to you.
Yes! We have clinics in San Antonio. Visit our website for the exact location.
Yes! We serve Fort Worth. Check our website for the clinic location.
Yes! We have a clinic in Arlington, Texas. Visit our website for details.
Yes! We serve Pasadena, Texas. Check our website for the clinic location.
Yes! We have a clinic at 14510 S Josey Ln, Farmers Branch, TX 75234.
Tenemos 19 ubicaciones convenientes en todo Texas, incluyendo Dallas, Fort Worth, Houston, Pasadena, Fresno, Farmers Branch, Arlington y San Antonio.

We offer comprehensive healthcare services including general health check-ups, preventive care, screenings, and routine medical visits. All services are designed to keep you and your family healthy at affordable prices starting at $19.

questions.q: What can you help me with?
questions.a: We provide quality healthcare services including general check-ups, health screenings, preventive care, and routine medical consultations. Our team is here to help you stay healthy.
Yes! General health check-ups are one of our core services, starting at just $19. Our team checks your vitals, answers questions, and helps you maintain good health.
We offer a wide range of treatments including general health check-ups, preventive care, health screenings, and routine medical services. Contact us for specific treatment availability.

questions.q: Can you help with routine care?
questions.a: Absolutely! Routine care is what we do best. From check-ups to screenings, we provide comprehensive care starting at $19.
Yes! Preventive care is essential to staying healthy. We offer check-ups, screenings, and health consultations starting at $19.
A general check-up includes vital signs monitoring, health assessment, and consultation with our medical team to help you stay healthy.

Ofrecemos servicios integrales de atención médica que incluyen chequeos generales de salud, atención preventiva, exámenes y visitas médicas de rutina. Todos los servicios están diseñados para mantener a usted y su familia saludables a precios asequibles desde $19.
No appointment needed! We welcome walk-ins, making it easy to get care when you need it. However, you can schedule an appointment if you prefer.
Yes! We accept walk-ins. No appointment necessary, though scheduling ahead can help minimize wait times.

questions.q: How do I schedule an appointment?
questions.a: You can schedule by calling us, texting, or using our online chat. Walk-ins are also welcome!
Absolutely! Walk-ins are welcome at all our locations. No appointment needed.

questions.q: What if I don't have an appointment?
questions.a: No problem! We accept walk-ins at all our clinics. Come in whenever it's convenient for you.
Yes! Walk-ins are welcome. Visit any of our 17 locations for care today.

questions.q: How do I book an appointment?
questions.a: You can book by phone, text, or online chat. Walk-ins are also always welcome!
¡No se necesita cita! Aceptamos visitas sin cita previa, lo que facilita obtener atención cuando la necesita. Sin embargo, puede programar una cita si lo prefiere.
Our clinic hours vary by location. Most clinics are open Monday through Friday with extended hours, and some locations offer Saturday hours. Contact your nearest clinic for specific hours.
We're open throughout the week with convenient hours at all 17 locations. Hours vary by clinic, so please check with your nearest location.
Some of our locations offer Saturday hours. Please contact your nearest clinic to confirm weekend availability.
Closing times vary by location. Most clinics have extended weekday hours to serve you better. Contact your nearest clinic for specific hours.
Most of our clinics are open Monday through Friday, with some Saturday hours available. Contact your nearest location to confirm today's hours.
Some locations offer Saturday hours. Contact your nearest clinic to confirm weekend availability.
Opening times vary by location. Most clinics open early to serve you. Contact your nearest clinic for specific hours.

Nuestros horarios de clínica varían según la ubicación. La mayoría de las clínicas están abiertas de lunes a viernes con horarios extendidos, y algunas ubicaciones ofrecen horarios los sábados. Contacte su clínica más cercana para horarios específicos.
Insurance is not required! Our affordable $19 visits make quality healthcare accessible without insurance. We focus on providing affordable care to everyone.
No insurance is needed for our services. We offer affordable care starting at $19, making healthcare accessible to all.

questions.q: I don't have insurance, can I still come?
questions.a: Absolutely! No insurance is required. Our mission is to make healthcare accessible with affordable $19 visits.
Our services are designed to be affordable without insurance, starting at $19. This ensures everyone has access to quality care.
¡No se requiere seguro! Nuestras visitas asequibles de $19 hacen que la atención médica de calidad sea accesible sin seguro. Nos enfocamos en proporcionar atención asequible para todos.
¡Sí! Our bilingual team speaks both English and Spanish. We're here to serve you in your preferred language.
Yes! We have bilingual staff who speak both English and Spanish to serve our community better.

questions.q: Can I get help in Spanish?
questions.a: ¡Por supuesto! Our team is bilingual and ready to help you in Spanish or English.
¡Sí! Nuestro equipo bilingüe habla español e inglés. Estamos aquí para servirle en su idioma preferido.
We're a bilingual clinic serving our community in both English and Spanish.

questions.q: I'm a new patient, what do I need?
questions.a: Welcome! For your first visit, please bring a valid ID and any relevant medical information. No insurance is required, and our visits start at just $19.

questions.q: What do I bring for my first visit?
questions.a: Please bring a valid ID and any medical records or medications you're currently taking. No insurance needed!

questions.q: How do I register as a new patient?
questions.a: Simply walk in to any of our 17 locations or call ahead. We'll help you register quickly and get you the care you need.

questions.q: Can I come in as a new patient today?
questions.a: Absolutely! Walk-ins are welcome. Bring your ID and we'll get you registered and seen by our caring team.
¡Bienvenido! Para su primera visita, por favor traiga una identificación válida y cualquier información médica relevante. No se requiere seguro, y nuestras visitas comienzan en solo $19.
Yes! We provide care for the whole family, including children. Our compassionate team is here to help keep your family healthy.
Absolutely! We welcome patients of all ages and provide family-friendly care starting at $19.
Yes, we provide care for children and families. Our team is experienced in treating patients of all ages.
Yes! We're proud to serve families and provide compassionate care for all ages, starting at just $19 per visit.
¡Sí! Brindamos atención para toda la familia, incluidos los niños. Nuestro equipo compasivo está aquí para ayudar a mantener saludable a su familia.
You can reach us by phone, text, or through our online chat. Visit our website for contact information for your nearest clinic.
Each of our 17 locations has its own phone number. Visit our website to find contact information for your nearest clinic.
Yes! We accept text messages. Contact your nearest clinic for their specific contact information.
You can reach us by phone, text, online chat, or email. Visit our website for your nearest clinic's contact details.
Puede comunicarse con nosotros por teléfono, mensaje de texto o a través de nuestro chat en línea. Visite nuestro sitio web para obtener información de contacto de su clínica más cercana.
We believe everyone deserves quality care. Our mission is to provide affordable, compassionate healthcare starting at just $19—no insurance needed. We make health a right, not a privilege.
We exist to make quality healthcare accessible to everyone, especially underserved communities. Starting at $19 with no insurance required, we believe health is a right.
We proudly serve Texas communities, especially the Hispanic population, providing affordable healthcare starting at $19. Everyone deserves quality care.
We make healthcare accessible with $19 visits, no insurance required, bilingual staff, and 17 convenient locations. We believe quality care should be available to everyone.

Creemos que todos merecen atención de calidad. Nuestra misión es proporcionar atención médica asequible y compasiva desde solo $19, sin necesidad de seguro. Hacemos de la salud un derecho, no un privilegio.
